name: Negative (badtrip)
description:
Please Play this game in fullscreen mode so that you can see the HP bar correctly.

I recommend enabling full screen mode in the menu before hitting play, both in the browser and UnityWebGL (You can exit pressing esc ).

A game made for the FUNJAM 10/05/2020. The theme was Negative. In a Film Negative when more photons hits a silver crystal, the silver crystal turns black!

This game is about a silver crystal that try to escape from photons. Try to survive not
becoming darker and Comment with your high score!

Unfortunately this was my first game jam so i did wrong a lot of things, i wanted to implement more animations and effects, and the sound is not really what i wanted it to be, but it was my first try!

Commands: You can move with WASD or the arrow keys and you shoot with the left mouse button.
